transcript.text: hi there welcome to my youtube channel
i'm your host praying medic here's
today's message
hey everybody this is pragmatic thanks
for tuning in my message today is going
to be one that is a little uncomfortable
for me it's going to be a short message
I want to outline today the services
that I have to offer people who come to
my website who know me as a friend or as
a mentor there is a lot of
misunderstanding about exactly what it
is I have to offer so today I'd like to
clarify what it is i can offer you if
you've listened to my podcast and read
my books you know that i'm pretty big on
healing i wrote a book on divine healing
i teach on physical healing emotional
healing I teach on deliverance these
things are very important to me and one
of my favorite scripture verses is
Matthew 10 verses 7 and 8 as you go
preach saying the kingdom of heaven is
at hand heal the sick cleanse the lepers
raise the dead cast out demons these are
the things that I teach people to do now
I receive a lot of emails and private
messages where people asked me to pray
for them for healing physical healing or
emotional healing or deliverance and I
always honor prayer requests when I
receive them however I want to make
clear what the main focus of my ministry
is when Jesus gave the disciples this
commission that's recorded in Matthew
chapter 10 and he was talking about the
things as they should do for people who
were unfamiliar with the gospel who did
not know the gospel of grace who did not
know the power of God so the disciples
went out and they're going to use
demonstrations of power to reveal the
nature of God and his kingdom this was
to unbelievers my commission comes from
Ephesians chapter 4 verses 11 and 12
speaking of Jesus Paul wrote and he
himself gave some to be apostles some
prophets some evangelists some pastors
and teachers for the equipping the
Saints for the work of the ministry for
the edifying of the body of Christ that
is where I take my commission from my
main ministry is not focused on healing
other people and this is the first thing
I'd like to clarify when I receive
emails and private messages from people
many
write to me and say you have such a
great healing anointing could you please
pray for me to be healed well as I said
I always honor prayer requests and I
will pray for anyone who sends a request
to me but I do want people to understand
that praying for other people to be
healed is not my main ministry I don't
spend a lot of time praying for an
individual to be healed when someone
sends me a prayer request I don't spend
enough time to get a word of knowledge I
don't usually spend time enough to get
revelation from God about specific
things most of the time when i receive a
prayer request i pray it's very short
and i go on to the next prayer request
because in any given day I receive a lot
of requests and I can't spend as much
time as some people would praying for
each individual person so if you send me
a request and you asked me to pray for
you just know that I will pray for you
but generally speaking I'm not going to
get back to you and give you specific
revelation I don't generally keep track
of or write down the things that I see
are the things that the Lord shows me I
just pray as I'm LED and that's it and I
go on to the next one again my ministry
is not primarily a prayer ministry my
ministry is a teaching ministry there's
only one or two people that I pray for
on a regular basis I have a friend named
Ravi Kapoor who has been a friend of
mine on facebook for many years and
Robbie and I pray for each other not
daily but very often other than Ravi
there aren't very many people I pray for
on a regular basis like I said if you
send me a message I will pray for you
but please don't send me a message
saying would you please pray for me
every day because I received hundreds of
emails private messages and I cannot
keep track of everyone who needs prayer
every day I'm not an intercessor so
unfortunately you can't expect me to
pray for two or three hours over your
situation I love intercessors I think
they're amazing but I am NOT an
intercessor I'm a teacher so if you do
send me a prayer request just realize i
will honor it it's going to be short the
funny thing is even though i often pray
very short prayers
we do receive back some incredible
testimonies of people who have been
healed occasionally financial and legal
breakthroughs I don't want to give you
the impression that my prayers aren't
effective they just tend to be very
short I also occasionally receive
requests for deliverance and any people
to know again my main ministry is not
deliverance only occasionally do i do
personal deliverance and it's usually
with a friend someone I've known for a
while if you have a request or a need
for deliverance and you send me a
message generally speaking I'm going to
refer you to someone who has a
deliverance ministry and that's what
they do full time and the same thing is
true for emotional healing although I do
some emotional healing again it's
generally with friends or people that I
know it's not all that frequent and
these people are essentially guinea pigs
or I'm trying to learn new techniques
for emotional healing if you need
emotional healing I'm probably going to
refer you to someone who does this full
time or has a lot more free time to do
it when a blind man was asked by Jesus
what do you want he said I want to be
able to see Jesus gave him his sight he
generally gave according to precisely
what a person asked for and that is how
I respond to people when they contact me
if someone has a headache and they want
me to pray for their headache to go away
that's exactly what I'm going to do I'm
going to pray for their headache to go
away if someone contacts name says they
want to learn how to make other people's
headaches go away that is a completely
different question and I will spend a
lot more time and give that person
resources and information so that they
can pray effectively and make other
people's pain go away I think it's said
that many times we ask for the wrong
things instead of asking to be trained
and taught how to do things we simply
ask a person to do it for us and then
next week we have to ask them to do it
again we never learn how to do it
ourselves that's why I think it's much
more valuable to spend my time teaching
people the nature of my ministry is
teaching it's not really healing or
deliverance I am a teacher I'm much
better at teaching than I am at doing I
can teach people to do things I can't
even do myself when my children were
we used to go to the Oregon coast one
day the kids decided they wanted to go
surfing now I'd never been surfing but
I'd watched a lot of surfers and I
decided to rent a surfboard for the kids
I knew enough about watching surfers
that I thought I could teach my kids how
to surf so I spent a day showing the
kids how to read the waves how to get up
on the board how to paddle it with the
waves and then how stand up on it we
practice this for hours and hours and by
the end of the day the kids are actually
able to surf pretty well considering
that it only been doing it one day it
was then that I realized my real gift is
teaching I can teach people to do things
I can't even do myself because I analyze
the process of how these things work and
I can explain it to other people and
show them and demonstrate it even though
I may not be able to do it myself you
might call that an unusual gift but that
is what I do I'm very good at teaching
so if you are a person who needs
instruction I am the person that you're
looking for if you are a person who
needs a lot of daily prayer I am
probably not the best person some people
will ask me well why don't I emphasize
praying in my ministry what about James
chapter 5 verse 14 is anyone among you
sick let him call for the elders of the
church and let them pray over him
anointing him with oil in the name of
the Lord doesn't that mean that we
should pray for each other it absolutely
means it should pray for each other I do
pray for other people and sometimes I
lay hands on them and sometimes i'll
anoint them with oil but these are
people that are in my fellowship in my
circle of friends the admonition from
James here is for people in a
congregation to call for the elders of
that congregation not to go to a
stranger or someone on the other side of
the world and say hey can you get me
healed now I realized that many people
don't have a regular church that they
attend I don't have one either but I do
have a lot of good leaving friends who
are qualified as elders and today with
social media you can get connected to
any one of thousands of groups of people
on facebook on other social media
platforms there really is no reason to
be isolated from a body a believer
I do most of my fellowship online I
receive prayer from a lot of my friends
I receive counsel I received teaching
and instruction from people who are more
mature than me and i have received
prayer from them and i have been healed
so if you're a person who is looking for
instruction and living the supernatural
life and healing and deliverance and
emotional healing and singing the spirit
travelling spirit if you want
instruction on those subjects if you
want to grow and know how to do them you
have come to the right place I have
videos podcasts articles all that stuff
is free you are welcome to plow into it
and learn as much as you can and while
you're learning you're welcome to send
me messages and I will be happy to spend
time with you explaining things
answering your questions it's really the
inquisitive students the people who want
to know more about the kingdom that I
invest most of my time with when I find
someone who is a student who wants to
learn how to do these things I will
spend just about as much time as I can
training and equipping them that's my
passion if I had my choice between
seeing a hundred people healed in one
day or training 10 people how to heal
there is no question that i would spend
my time training 10 people out of heal
because those 10 people over their
lifetime will heal hundreds of thousands
of people and that's a much better
investment of my time and speaking of
training right now i'm putting together
the materials for an online class i'll
have more information available on that
in the future thanks for dropping by i
hope you enjoyed today's message you
might consider sharing it with your
friends you can do that through the
links provided below the video if you
have questions your comment my email
address is Edmond at pragmatic com if
you haven't visited my website I have a
lot of articles and videos there you
might want to check out it's ww-p rmx
calm you can also connect with me on
Facebook and Twitter thanks for dropping
by and I hope you'll consider
subscribing to my channel
you
